partintro.title: Introduction à KDE
partintro.para: KDE is a comprehensive desktop environment that builds on XFree86 et QT to provide a window manager et many user tools, including a browser, word processor, spreadsheet, persentation package, games, et numerous other utilities. It provides extensive capabilites for customization.

We divide the KDE instructions into three parts. Firstly, the core packages which you need for the rest of KDE to work. Secondly, additional packages which provide functionality in various areas (multimedia, graphics etc) et finally, other KDE packages.

KDE also has many internationalization packages in the form of: kde-i18n-xx-&kde-version;.tar.bz2 where the xx is a two to five letter code for the country covered. We do not cover the installation of these packages here.
